mdRecord.dcterms:title: Theatre at Virginia Tech 2008-2009 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for 2008-2009 Season Theatre at Virginia Tech. Plays: A Skull in Connemara by Martin McDonagh | Iphigenia 2.0 by Charles Mee | Trestle at Pope Lick Creek by Naomi Wallace | Her Sexy Outfit from Lysistrata by Aristophanes, adaptation by Daniel Zippi.
